source: 这个老师请这个学生背刚刚他在黑板上写的课文。
correct reference: The teacher asked the student to recite the text he had just written on the blackboard.
incorrect reference: The teacher asked the student to carry the text he had just written on the blackboard.
base translation: The teacher asked the student to recite the text that he had just written on the blackboard.
debate translation: The teacher asked the student to recite the text that he had just written on the blackboard.
reason: The teacher is giving the student a task to complete, so ask is the more appropriate translation of 请. 背 can be translated as recite, which is more appropriate in this context because the teacher is asking the student to repeat the text out loud. 刚刚 indicates that the teacher had just written the text on the blackboard. 他在黑板上写的课文 translates to the text that he had just written on the blackboard.
